document_data.name: ''Crown of the Lost King''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Crown of the Lost King''''' was a unique antique [[enchanted]] crown from the mega-dungeon of [[Undermountain]].
document_data.Powers: The crown possessed the ''challenger's might'' enchantment that greatly boosted the wearer's might, accuracy, defense, and luck and made their deadly hits land much easier.
document_data.History: The ''Crown of the Lost King'' was a mysterious item from the time of distant antiquity and all history and lore associated with the artifact were long lost.
